title: Gold Steadies as Traders Look Beyond Venezuela Risk to US Data
description: Gold steadied, as traders looked beyond tensions in Venezuela toward a busy lineup of economic data in the US.
content: Gold steadied, as traders looked beyond tensions in Venezuela toward a busy lineup of economic data in the US.
